body: NTR is the best. It exposes all you losers that will never get a girlfriend to cheat on you anyways. Sexless virgins.
Avid ntr appreciator, you've got ntr collection? Dont mind if I check it~~
Wow what a great art.i really like it
Great story, drawn decently but the facial expressions was just too off, specifically the hodoka guy... But anythimg other than that was great! So I rate this a 6.8/10
Why is it this series has so few doujins, and the few it does have are cringy NTR shit?

Really good art. Imo, if there's a guy who wants a girl but can't have her and watches someone else who does, then it's NTR. Doesn't matter if she's his gf, his wife, his friend, his mom, sister, or whatever else. The core of it isn't their relationship, but the frustration and devastation he feels as the cuck, and the wanton abandon she feels as she gets crazy hot sex and pleasure. This achieves that.

its still more of an ntr than those "ntr" that don't even involve the losing side (it just becomes normal cheating) or those weird family ntrs like bullies fucking someone's mom (which shouldn't even be ntr)
Parodies make weak NTR. This is more netorase than NTR. Needs more backstory. The group should have made an original story with their own characters. Their art is decent enough.
Read the last line, it's ntr.
For me...THAT'S NOT NTR! It's like a couple in which either side is porn acter
This was a good nut buster, definitely an 8/10.
